The touch detection is not proper as you go deeper on Z axis. So if you want to rotate the back face, it would be easier to first bring it to the right or front and then rotate it. I'm working on this issue and a fix will be available soon. 

You can increase the cube size as much as you want. However, once you go beyond seven, it becomes harder to touch on the desired piece. 

As mentioned above, machine-solving is implemented only for 3x3x3 cube. Fork me on github if you're interested in adding support for cubes of other dimensions. In case of any suggestions or queries, please create a ticket in github. 

https://github.com/amarghosh/rubiks-cube
Starts a new game. The number of initial rotations can be modified from the settings page
The "app" uses a naive algorithm to solve the cube. It takes more steps than necessary. Currently only 3x3x3 is supported.
Toggle between rotating the whole cube or the touched face
